description.en:
BPOP is a mobile portal for digital financial investors. BPOP is committed to creating a rich, interesting and practical digital financial investment advisory ecology, helping new users to quickly integrate into the digital financial investment circle and culture, improve their investment skills and obtain better investment returns.
In August 2018, BPOP gained the cornerstone investment from Genesis, MXC Fundation, AlphaCoin, Continue, Acropolis, and Da Shi. The number of registered users of APP is close to 200,000, and the monthly revenue exceeds 40 BTC.
